a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: FAO projections of arable land, 1961 to 2050
Global land allocated to arable production or permanent crops from 1961-2014, with the UN Food and
Agricultural Organization's (FAO) projections to 2050. Land area is measured in hectares.
Data source: FAO 2030-50 Projections of Arable Land (FAO (2017))
